general.gigTitle: create, design, redesign, customize, revamp and development wordpress website

sellerCard.oneLiner: I'm specialist in wordpress and ecom
sellerCard.description: Hey, I'm Soikot! I am a certified web developer. I have 5+ years of experience as a WordPress, Shopify, kajabi and wix. Your satisfaction is my motivation! Also, I have skilled in Html, CSS, Squarespace, Webflow, and Photoshop. I create designs in pixel-perfect and unique ways. I work with a focus on quality, aesthetics and professionalism to deliver the right product for your business. Let's get started working with your dream website! I will give you unlimited revisions and one month of free support. Thanks for your interest.

description.content:
Are you looking for a wordpress website that promote your brand or business with a professional and attractive touch?


Your search ends here!


I specialize in providing top-quality stunning and fully functional WordPress website design and redesign services that captivate your audience and boost your online presence. I can help you to design and development a professional responsive website from scratch or redesign an existing WordPress site to the next level.


Unlock added benefits, such as:

  1. Dynamic Website
  2. Impressive Portfolio
  3. Engaging One-page/Landing Page
  4. WooCommerce Online Store
  5. Creative WordPress Divi and Elementor Websites
  6. Specialized Sites for Business, Real Estate, Health, Fitness
  7. Functionalities for Hotel Booking, LMS, and Appointments
  8. WordPress Installation and Domain Configuration
  9. Versatility in Clone, Transfer, Backup, and Migration
  10. Multi-language Site Capabilities


Why Choose Me?

  1. Clear and Effective Communication
  2. Professional Designs that Adapt to Your Needs
  3. Guaranteed Satisfaction
  4. Unlimited Revisions for Your Peace of Mind
  5. 30 Days of VIP Support


Ready to stand out in the digital crown? Take the first step towards success get touch in today

slide.name: create, design, redesign, customize, revamp and development wordpress website

questionsAndAnswers.question: I'm prepared to buy it! What do I require in order to begin?c
questionsAndAnswers.answer: A hosting account and a domain name are required (if you don't have these I will help you. In order to design the form, I will also require your logo, names and numbers of pages, a few phrases about your website or business, an e-mail address

questionsAndAnswers.question: How come I forgot to give you the hosting and domain details?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I will deliver the order in a zip file and with screenshots of all pages and links.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will tablets and smartphones display my website well?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: We exclusively utilize responsive themes, so no matter what device you see your site on-including a tablet or smartphone-it will always adapt flawlessly.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can I make changes to the content of my website on my own?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: We work with you to teach you the fundamentals of changing the material on your website after every assignment.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide domain name registration and hosting?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No, I don't offer domain name registration or hosting. It is strongly advised that you buy these in your own name so that you may control the website completely.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What happens if there is no content?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I'll use drag-and-drop page builders to easily change the placeholder text and pictures.

openGraph.title: create, design, redesign, customize, revamp and development wordpress website

reviews.comment: Did an amazing job making a better website than all my competitors. Their work is extremely high quality, you’d be a fool not to buy a site from here. Custom layouts, full design language use of our brand, blog features, SEO optimized, etc. They truly do the best work on this platform.

seller_response.comment: Fantastic client. It's always a pleasure to collaborate! Awaiting the upcoming order.-:)

reviews.comment: Soykot was able to quickly understand the look and feel of the website I wanted, and delivered a website that is perfectly me! She is very talented and patient. I would highly recommend using her!

seller_response.comment: Thanks for your continued business and communication. Let me know if you need anything in the future.

reviews.comment: Soykot is an excellent Freelancer, He completed my project without any hitches. But he was very clear about the subject which resulted in a great website. I will use Soykot for my next project. If you need a good quality website then I recommend working with Soykot.

Soykot S did an OUTSTANDING job in website development by delivering a bug-free and well-documented project that FAR exceeded my expectations. The process was smooth as he maintained exceptional politeness and was highly cooperative, always meeting deadlines on time. Working with Soykot was a delight and I look forward to collaborating again! 😊

seller_response.comment: Amazing encounter! Buyer was extremely helpful and informative. Thanks a lot.

reviews.comment: Soykot once again delivered exceptional work—bug-free, well-documented, and exceeding expectations! His proactive communication, fluency, and politeness made the entire process smooth and enjoyable. I highly recommend him for website development! 🙌

seller_response.comment: Thanks for the appreciation. I always deliver as promised and more always.
